summary: A small southwestern town Sheriff finds a body in the desert with a suitcase and five hundred thousand dollars. He impersonates the man and stumbles into an F.B.I. investigation.
cast: Willem Dafoe|Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio|Mickey Rourke|Samuel L. Jackson|M. Emmet Walsh|James Rebhorn|Maura Tierney|Beth Grant|Alexander Nicksay|Fredrick Lopez|Miguel Sandoval|John Lafayette|Ken Thorley|Jack Kehler|Royce D. Applegate|Megan Butler|Lisa Cloud|Steve Cormier|Steve Tyler|J.D. Garfield|William P. Bennet|Tom Conner|Joy Bouton|Meredith Marshall|Doc Phillips|Ben Zeller|Karen Breeding|Bo Greigh|Tanit Lee Lascelles|Mimi Rogers|John P. Ryan|Fred Thompson
title: Arenas blancas
